dc_description_s: 1 map : 55.5 x 76 cm.|Relief shown pictorially.|North is oriented to upper right corner of the map.|Four vignettes along bottom of map, include Avery House, Palace Pharmacy, Sherman House, and Central Park house.|Bird's eyes view includes index of hotels, manufacturies, livery stables, news papers [sic], churches, professionals, and business references throughout the city. Also includes names of streets on the map.|A short history of Mt. Clemens and the reasons for its rapid growth is found under the index.
